comment: Proof of ~ ax6e (hence ~ ax6 ) from Tarski's system, ~ ax-c9 , ~ ax-c16 . Remark: ~ ax-6 is used only via its principal (unbundled) instance ~ ax6v . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
